data.headline: Experienced Data Scientist with Expertise in Enterprise-Scale Analytics
data.summary: Seasoned Data Scientist with a strong background in developing and deploying large-scale data analytics solutions for enterprise-level organizations. Proficient in leveraging a variety of data engineering and machine learning techniques to derive actionable insights and drive data-driven decision-making. Adept at collaborating cross-functionally with stakeholders to align business objectives with technical capabilities.

experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
bullets: Designed and implemented scalable data pipelines to ingest, process, and analyze large volumes of structured and unstructured data from various sources.
Developed and deployed predictive models using machine learning techniques to solve complex business problems, including customer churn prediction, demand forecasting, and fraud detection.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring the alignment of analytics initiatives with organizational goals.
Mentored and trained junior data scientists, sharing best practices and promoting knowledge-sharing within the team.

experience.title: Data Scientist
bullets: Designed and implemented data processing workflows to extract, transform, and load data from multiple sources into a centralized data warehouse.
Developed and deployed machine learning models to automate various business processes, such as customer segmentation, product recommendation, and anomaly detection.
Collaborated with business stakeholders to understand their data-driven requirements and translate them into actionable analytical solutions.
Participated in the development of data visualization dashboards to enable data-driven decision-making at the executive level.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

projects.name: Predictive Maintenance for Industrial Equipment
projects.description: Developed a predictive maintenance solution using machine learning techniques to forecast equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules, resulting in reduced downtime and maintenance costs.

projects.name: Personalized Product Recommendations
projects.description: Designed and implemented a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and deep learning algorithms to provide personalized product recommendations, leading to increased customer engagement and sales.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Aadhya Sharma, a mid-career data scientist with a formal, corporate demeanor and confident expression.
